designTokens.name: $color-background
designTokens.comment: Default background color for the whole app.

designTokens.name: $color-background-alt
designTokens.comment: Second default background color for the whole app.

designTokens.name: $color-background-alt-2
designTokens.comment: Used when further differentiation is needed because $color-background and $color-background-alt are both being used in close proximity.

designTokens.name: $color-background-alt-inverse
designTokens.comment: Alternative background color for dark portions of the app.

designTokens.name: $color-background-highlight-search
designTokens.comment: Background color for highlighting text search results.

designTokens.name: $color-background-scrollbar
designTokens.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar.

designTokens.name: $color-background-scrollbar-track
designTokens.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar track.

designTokens.name: $color-background-selection
designTokens.comment: Used as the background color for selected text and elements.

designTokens.name: $color-background-row-hover
designTokens.comment: Used as the background color for the hover state on rows or items on list-like components.
